Title: Vision Quest
Plot: With the campus empty of everyone else except for him, Thad goes on a vision quest that will help him determine whether he should leave college behind for a professional football career or stay at Blue Mountain State and finish his education.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Frankie Shaw, Page Kennedy, Omari Newton, Denise Richards, Omari Newton
